price: ហើយ(ចូរចងចាំ)នៅថ្ងៃដែលមេឃនឹងបែកចេញជាមួយ នឹងដុំពពកជាច្រើន ហើយគេបានបញ្ចុះម៉ាឡាអ៊ីកាត់មកជាបន្ដបន្ទាប់។
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِٱلۡغَمَٰمِ وَنُزِّلَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ تَنزِيلًا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wayawma tashaqqaqu al-samāu bil-ghamāmi wanuzzila al-malāikatu tanzīlan
